name: Necro (NoonTimeDreamer)
description:
Join Orcen and Llucks as they travel, beat up slimes, and grow an army of undead minions.

WASD - to move

LEFT CLICK - attack or station minions

SPACE - recall nearby

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme, stronger together.

Abandoned Bamboo Shack from Anttis Instrumentals
